name: Tower Munchers
description:
Tower Munchers is a short game made originally as part of a 48 hour private game jam. I then built on top of it during the couple of weekends that followed.

Protect your tower from being munched! Kill robotic munchers by throwing projectiles and shooting missiles at them. Win the game by destroying all the munchers' spawners using your missile launcher, while preventing repair bots from repairing said spawners. Have fun and enjoy!

How to install:

- Choose game for your system version and download the zip file.

- Extract zip file.

- Start game using "TowerMunchers.exe" .
